segments.text: What companies are stockholders in this company , do you know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , the main stockholder is International Business Machines Corporation , namely , IBM for short .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What section would you like to work in if you enter this company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish to work in the planning department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of work will you expect to do at first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I expect to operate computers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your plans for the future ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish to move up to higher positions with acquisition of more experience in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long does it take to get here from your home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a twenty-minute bus ride .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long do you think that we can depend on your working here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll work here as long as you expect me to .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are single now , but what will you do when you get married ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve thought about that a lot . I know that many women take a job , planning to make a career of it , and then they change their mind . But I am hoping to make it my lifetime work . So if I get married , I will find some ways that I can continue my work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think you will want to continue working here even after you ’ Ve had a child ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ideas do you have if we employ you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ever since I was a young girl , I ’ Ve been clever with my hands . I ’ Ve always enjoyed doing detailed work . If I could use that ability to make your products a little better and to benefit the company , I would be happy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any particular conditions that you would like the company to take into consideration ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , nothing in particular .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you are employed by us , how are you going to do your part of the work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll first get further information about our goals , ways , counterparts and management , etc . . Then I ’ ll make my plan . And then I ’ ll go with all my effort to see it is realized .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you fail to do your work well , what are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll report it honestly . I ’ ll give a correct analysis . I may quit the job - and pay compensation . But I have my way to judge whether I fail .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think if you do not have much spare time on this job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: People are supposed to work hard within regular work time , especially when it is an important work that is highly paid for . I don ’ t mind work over spare time if it is paid for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your expectations from working on this job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Getting more experience with a widely-known company like yours . Using my speciality in marketing and management . And getting advancement in salary and position . Show my enterprise , confidence and character in passing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you were choosing a person for this job , what kind of individual would you select ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would select the individual that has the most qualifications among all the applicants . He doesn ’ t have to be the person if we have to fill the vacancy . But he has to be the best , even if we have to pay him higher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If we do not employ you , what are you going to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will feel it is a pity . But I will not feel so bad . I will go for other interviews until I am employed satisfactorily . Hopefully before I find another position , you will call me back .
segments.speaker: S2
